comment._content: Looks like Herbert Hadley was Republican Gov. of Missouri: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_Hadley His colleague appears to be another Republican politician, also from St. Louis, Charles Nagel was Secretary of Commerce and Labor in President Taft's cabinet. article on Nagel: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Nagel Nagel is accused of malfeasance in this later article from NYTimes: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_Hadley
